items.sentence: I think Tom is going to be pretty mad when he finds out that the painting he bought is a fake.
I think if I talked more often with a native speaker, my English skills would improve quickly.
Several men got angry with Tom in the bar and Tom told them he wasn\'t afraid to take them on.
Tom called Mary to ask her whether she wanted him to buy some bread on his way home from work.
Tom wished he had had the courage to jump into the river and save the baby that had fallen in.
Tom told Mary that he wouldn\'t be able finish the job in the amount of time she\'d given him.
After school, Tom usually sticks around as long as he can because he doesn\'t want to go home.
Tom can\'t figure out how Mary was able to plan a surprise party without him knowing about it.
Tom tasted the popcorn and decided it wasn\'t salty enough, so he sprinkled on some more salt.
Tom would have liked to attend Mary\'s party. Unfortunately, he had other things he had to do.
Mary is really great. She cooked a wonderful dinner for me and even washed the dishes herself.
If your father asks your mother a question in French, does she answer in French or in English?
Tom and Mary and their children all live together in a small house on the outskirts of Boston.
Tom and Mary had a romantic dinner to celebrate the first anniversary of their being together.
Tom began to undress, but then noticed that the curtain was open, so he went over to close it.
Optimists see opportunities in disasters while pessimists find disasters in every opportunity.
The students who are occupying the administration building have threatened to kill themselves.
The burning of coal is responsible for more than 40% of Australia\'s greenhouse gas emissions.
When you meet someone for the first time, be careful about how close you stand to that person.
I don\'t know what Tom advised you to do, but I\'d suggest that you don\'t tell Mary about it.
